Articles.Content:
I was watching some vids and when they would intercept like the Mun, the predicted peri is at the current location of the body. When i do it, it is where i will intercept it. I want to be able to focus on the mun in the map and change the peri with ease. Any ideas?

Edited October 17, 2013 by bigpapabearxx
In your settings.cfg file, change the CONIC_PATCH_DRAW_MODE to 0.
